apiVersion.description: Your API version, used to show it on the swagger explorer

versionId.description: The version id is used to versioning your services. This will define the service version access (services.cats.v1)

info.description: The swagger UI options. See https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-ui

basePath.description: The base path of your API, example: '/v1/api/'

noInheritance.description: Add the name of the services here that you don't want to inherit from the previous service version. Ex: { 'cats': ['find']}

allOf.description: The array of operations that you don't want to inherit from the previous operations
